sentence.Network_en: Which means a clean ballplayer can still hit a dirty home run.
sentence.Network_cn: 也就是说,已经不服用兴奋剂的棒球手,打出的本垒打仍可能和兴奋剂有关.

sentence.Network_en: I saw on ballplayer, no race horse.
sentence.Network_cn: 我的一个朋友见过一位并告诉我关于他的事.

sentence.Network_en: Mary is not a good ballplayer, is she?
sentence.Network_cn: 玛莉不是一个好球员, 对 吗 ?

entry.def: A ballplayer is a baseball player.

auth_sentence.content: He was smart, too, in knowing his own weaknesses as a ballplayer.
